mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_combination_gasq( id, master_id, joint_order_sn, order_group_id, order_number, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{masterId}, #{jointOrderSn}, #{orderGroupId}, #{orderNumber}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
